about: Final-year informatics student at Telkom University with T-shaped developer skills. Certified TensorFlow developer and data visualization from Google and PASAS. Won two data competitions and was a finalist in a statistics competition. Graduated with distinction and was in the top 53 for best projects from Google Bangkit Academy. I interned at Telkom Indonesia as a data scientist and achieved an average final score of 95. During my studies, I served as an assistant lecturer, lab, and practicum while also receiving a fully-funded scholarship from the East Kalimantan government. I am passionate about self-improvement and constantly seek opportunities to learn, grow, and empower others.
